title: Problem using the multimodal-live-api-web-console, GenExprorer example
body:
### Description of the bug:


When I start the app all works well but it says 
13:51server.errorCould not connect to "wss://autopush-generativelanguage.googleapis.com/ws/google.ai.generativelanguage.v1alpha.GenerativeService.BidiGenerateContent?key=XXXXXXX"

Note I have set the api key


### Actual vs expected behavior:


_No response_

### Any other information you'd like to share?


_No response_
author: oscarcalvo

comments.body:
In App.tsx if you remove `autopush-` from the host URL, that should fix it.

ex: `const host = "generativelanguage.googleapis.com";`
